CORE_AI.NAME: Combative
CORE_AI.DESC: Whenever one of Ai's arguments is destroyed, deal <style="Scalable">[STACKS]</style> damage to a random enemy argument.

CORE_DECKARD.NAME: Collected
CORE_DECKARD.DESC: At the start of Deckard's turn, this argument gains [STACKS] Poise.

CORE_NO_ABILITY.NAME: N/A
CORE_NO_ABILITY.DESC: This argument has no special effects.
